algorithm_technique: Set to store unique non-zero elements
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum operations to make all array elements zero by subtracting the smallest positive element.
problem_summary_technical: The minimum operations equal the count of unique positive elements in the array, as each unique positive value requires one subtraction step.
key_insights: The operation allows subtracting any positive value up to the smallest non-zero element.
Each distinct positive number in the array will eventually need to be targeted by a subtraction operation.
Using a set efficiently counts the unique positive numbers.
